import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './DigitalID.css'; const DigitalID = () => { const [isFlipped, setIsFlipped] = useState(false); const [isVerified, setIsVerified] = useState(true); const [showQR, setShowQR] = useState(false); const [profileData, setProfileData] = useState({ name: 'Alex Johnson', id: 'TID-2025-001234', nationality: 'Indian', destination: 'Delhi Heritage Tour', validUntil: '2025-12-31', emergencyContact: '+91 98765 43210', bloodGroup: 'O+', medicalConditions: 'None', photo: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1507003211169-0a1dd7228f2d?w=150&h=150&fit=crop&crop=face', qrCode: 'data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAEAAAABCAYAAAAfFcSJAAAADUlEQVR42mNk+M9QDwADhgGAWjR9awAAAABJRU5ErkJggg==' }); const [batteryLevel, setBatteryLevel] = useState(85); // Simulate real-time updates useEffect(() => { const interval = setInterval(() => { setBatteryLevel(prev => prev > 10 ? prev - 1 : 85); }, 60000); // Update every minute return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); const handleFlip = () => { setIsFlipped(!isFlipped); }; const getVerificationStatus = () => { return isVerified ? 'verified' : 'pending'; }; const getBatteryColor = () => { if (batteryLevel > 60) return '#4CAF50'; if (batteryLevel > 30) return '#FF9800'; return '#F44336'; }; return (
{/* Header Section */}

🆔 My Digital Tourist ID

Official Tourist Identification & Safety Card

🔋
{batteryLevel}%
Connected
{/* Main ID Card */}
{/* Front Side */}
{/* Card Header */}
🇮🇳
INDIA Tourist Safety Division
{isVerified ? '✓' : '⏳'}
{/* Profile Section */}

{profileData.name}

ID: {profileData.id}

{profileData.nationality} National Verified Tourist
{/* Details Section */}
🎯
Current Destination {profileData.destination}
📅
Valid Until {profileData.validUntil}
🚨
Emergency Contact {profileData.emergencyContact}
{/* Action Buttons */}
{/* QR Code Overlay */} {showQR && (

Tourist Verification QR

Scan to verify tourist identity and get emergency contacts

ID: {profileData.id}
)}
{/* Back Side */}

Medical & Emergency Information

🏥
🩸
Blood Group {profileData.bloodGroup}
💊
Medical Conditions {profileData.medicalConditions}
📞
Emergency Contact {profileData.emergencyContact}

🚨 In Case of Emergency

  • Contact the number above immediately
  • Show this ID to medical personnel
  • Tourist Police: 1363
  • Medical Emergency: 102
{Array.from({ length: 40 }, (_, i) => (
))}

{profileData.id}

{/* Quick Actions */}
alert('Sharing ID via secure link...')}>
📤
Share ID Generate secure share link
alert('Opening location services...')}>
📍
Location Share current location
alert('Initiating emergency protocol...')}>
🆘
Emergency Send distress signal
{/* Status Bar */}
🛡️ Protected
🔐 Encrypted
✅ Verified
📡 Live Tracking
); }; export default DigitalID;
